name: recursive-calc-element-coords
description: Get the position of an element relative to the document. The element can be nested inside absolute/relative/fixed elements, and it'll reliably get you the absolute coords. Returns an object {x: [number 0], y: [number 0]}

scripts.syndicate: git commit -am 'asdf'; git push; npm run build; npm version patch; npm publish

author: William Le
